import logo from './usc-logo.png'; import logo_mobile from './usc-logo-mobile.png'; import './App.css'; import Dropdown from 'react-dropdown'; import 'react-dropdown/style.css'; import DataTable from './dataTable.js'; const options = [ 'Annenberg College of Letters, Arts, and Sciences', 'School of Architecture', 'Bovard College', 'Kaufman School of Dance', 'Gould', 'Herman Ostrow', 'Iovine and Young', 'Leonard Davis', 'Marshall', 'Roski', 'Rossier', 'Price', 'Viterbi', , ]; const defaultOption = options[0]; function App() { return (

USC Support for Ukraine

USC faculty offer support for scholars and students displaced by the war in Ukraine

If you are a faculty member or a graduate student who left or is considering leaving Ukraine because of the war, USC may offer you a temporary place to continue your work or studies. Funding and visa support are available. See below for the available opportunities in each USC school. Please contact email@usc.edu if you are interested or if you have any questions.
Select a school/department:
); } export default App;
